Package info.ryandorman.simplescheduler.common

info.ryandorman.simplescheduler.common is a group of classes that provide utility and can be used commonly across applications.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlertUtil
    Allows easy creation and setup of javafx.scene.control.Alert components.
    CalendarUtil
    Allows for easy retrieval of and information on days relative to the week, month, and year of the current date.
    ColumnIterator
    Keeps track of the current data being read from a java.sql.ResultSet or into a java.sql.PreparedStatement.
    ComboBoxOption
    Allows for easy creation and predictable interaction with items/options used set in a javafx.scene.control.ComboBox.
    DatePickerInput
    Improves javafx.scene.control.DatePicker to ensures user text input causes the proper value updates.
    DBConnection
    Allows straight forward access to a Database connection.
    L10nUtil
    Assists with application localization.
    TimeSpinner
    Extends javafx.scene.control.Spinner to handle time input.
